docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Training documentation of FastRCNN_circle 1. Sort you picture 2. Convert ImageJ-Annotations (ROI) to BB-Circle-XMLs Open convert_imageJ_annos_to_BB_cirle_defs.m Change following variables: Input dir output dir Image type = 'bmp' # should set 'bmp' for SOPAT pictures class names: 'B, T' # 'Blasen' and 'Tropfen' Also check Fiji/ImageJ version - path name 3. Check if all annotations are correct Open gui_check_circle_annos.m 4. Create VOC training data struct from annos BB Open Visual Studio Open project --> create VOC training data struct from annos BB Right click on Python Environment -> Add/Remove Python Environment Choose Miniconda2 Click on Py.Data Change following variables: annoDir resultDir scales fractionOf if necessary other variables under user options (From trainval.txt to test.txt, sort representative and all kind of images) Click run 5. Create Symlink / Softlink Manually Create DNNs/dev/.../data Create VOCdevkit0020_folder name "imdbSubSetNames" Create Subfolder "results\VOC0020\Main" Open cmd as administrator --> cd to target folder Run mklink /d VOC0020 source_path_name Batch mode Open python_tools Run conda environment list - check if py36 is available Run activate py36 Open C:\DNNs\dev\DNNs_python_tools\inputDataFromVocFolders.py change rootVOCFolder and fasterRCNNDataFolder Run python inputDataFromVocFolders.py in cmd 6. Start the training Open Visual Studio --> perform_net_training.sln Open project --> create VOC training data struct from annos BB Right click on Python Environment -> Add/Remove Python Environment Choose Miniconda2 Click on Py.Data --> perform_net_training.py Important things to configure: showScores = False / # True In the solver.prototxt -- to change: base_lr gamma stepsize Initial Weight using orig.caffemodel Move or delete Old Voc data from output folder YML-Data for configuration PerformTesting on test (also possible with trainval) Change imdbSubSetNames to folder name after "VOC0020_" Edit YML Data, you can find it by copying path from python file. Configure following important variables: Scales: Aufloesung Region Proposal Net RPN_PRE_ hochschrauben PIXEL_MEAN: [55, 55, 55] CONF_THRESH: 0.8 Configure Config.py Click run More Tipps To detect 'big' Particles Set down the CONF_THRESH in YML data Do more annotations with 'big' droplets/bubbles Scale down the picture Delete VOC-Folder Always delete VOC-Folders or move them to output. Perform Net-Training Set up YML RPN_PRE_NMS_TOP_N & RPN_POST_NMS_TOP_N as high as possible (only change it in Test) in Testblock: CONF_THRESH: 0.5 Scale the picture (zusammen mit PRE & POST) FineTuning Change stepsize to 10.000 Do not change base_lr: 0.00005 nur mit den Gasblasenbildern
docs.title: Training FastRCNN_circle

docs.text: Open convert_imageJ_annos_to_BB_cirle_defs.m Change following variables: Input dir output dir Image type = 'bmp' # should set 'bmp' for SOPAT pictures class names: 'B, T' # 'Blasen' and 'Tropfen' Also check Fiji/ImageJ version - path name
docs.title: 2. Convert ImageJ-Annotations (ROI) to BB-Circle-XMLs
3. Check if all annotations are correct

docs.text: Open Visual Studio Open project --> create VOC training data struct from annos BB Right click on Python Environment -> Add/Remove Python Environment Choose Miniconda2 Click on Py.Data Change following variables: annoDir resultDir scales fractionOf if necessary other variables under user options (From trainval.txt to test.txt, sort representative and all kind of images) Click run
docs.title: 4. Create VOC training data struct from annos BB

docs.text: Create DNNs/dev/.../data Create VOCdevkit0020_folder name "imdbSubSetNames" Create Subfolder "results\VOC0020\Main" Open cmd as administrator --> cd to target folder Run mklink /d VOC0020 source_path_name
docs.title: Manually

docs.text: Open python_tools Run conda environment list - check if py36 is available Run activate py36 Open C:\DNNs\dev\DNNs_python_tools\inputDataFromVocFolders.py change rootVOCFolder and fasterRCNNDataFolder Run python inputDataFromVocFolders.py in cmd
docs.title: Batch mode

docs.text: Open Visual Studio --> perform_net_training.sln Open project --> create VOC training data struct from annos BB Right click on Python Environment -> Add/Remove Python Environment Choose Miniconda2 Click on Py.Data --> perform_net_training.py Important things to configure: showScores = False / # True In the solver.prototxt -- to change: base_lr gamma stepsize Initial Weight using orig.caffemodel Move or delete Old Voc data from output folder YML-Data for configuration PerformTesting on test (also possible with trainval) Change imdbSubSetNames to folder name after "VOC0020_" Edit YML Data, you can find it by copying path from python file. Configure following important variables: Scales: Aufloesung Region Proposal Net RPN_PRE_ hochschrauben PIXEL_MEAN: [55, 55, 55] CONF_THRESH: 0.8 Configure Config.py Click run
docs.title: 6. Start the training

docs.text: Set down the CONF_THRESH in YML data Do more annotations with 'big' droplets/bubbles Scale down the picture
docs.title: To detect 'big' Particles

docs.text: Always delete VOC-Folders or move them to output.
docs.title: Delete VOC-Folder

docs.text: Set up YML RPN_PRE_NMS_TOP_N & RPN_POST_NMS_TOP_N as high as possible (only change it in Test) in Testblock: CONF_THRESH: 0.5 Scale the picture (zusammen mit PRE & POST)
docs.title: Perform Net-Training

docs.text: Change stepsize to 10.000 Do not change base_lr: 0.00005 nur mit den Gasblasenbildern
docs.title: FineTuning
